messages.title: Tom Kelly Demands Crammavill Street Action
messages.content: Local Conservative, Tom Kelly, is calling for action to tackle the growing levels of anti-social behaviour in Stifford Clays, particularly around Crammavill Street shops.

messages.title: Call for work on Stifford Pot Holes
messages.content: With the recent cold weather and heavy snow leaving pot holes in many of our roads, local campaigner Tom Kelly is urging residents in Stifford Clays to report these to him so that action can be taken to have them repaired.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tom Kelly proposes to introduce measures including dispersal orders and an alcohol free zone to reduce anti-social behaviour in Stifford Clays.
Tom Kelly is calling on action to address the issue of pot holes in Stifford Clays, urging residents to report the issues for repair.

issues.economy: The document mentions the impact of Labour's economic failure and the need for economic prosperity through Conservative policies.
issues.health: David Cameron pledges to protect and improve the NHS with an increase in spending.

contactInformation.address: Thurrock Conservatives, Titan Works, Hogg Lane, Grays, RM17 5DU

images.caption: Tom Kelly photographed addressing the issue of potholes.
